item.title: Research
item.description: Air-Sea Modeling laboratory (http://airsea.yonsei.ac.kr) The interaction between the atmosphere and the ocean is critical to the earth climate. The exchange of momentum, heat and freshwater between the atmosphere and the ocean can shape the circulations in the air and sea, and the exchange of greenhouse gases such as carbon dioxide impacts the radiation balance of the climate.
